#BlackMagicCraft #Episode119

In this video I create some scenic bases for my cheap christmas village trees out of mdf, xps foam, and home made texture paste. 

If you missed the previous videos in the series:

CHEAP CHRISTMAS VILLAGE TREES REVIEW
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c9gTp07waoI

IMPROVING CHEAP CHRISTMAS VILLAGE TREES
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlAnpJomWCk&t=13s
